gw.api.webservice.pl.dataExtraction

Class DataExtractionAPIBase

  • gw.api.webservice.pl.dataExtraction.DataExtractionAPIBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remote

    public class DataExtractionAPIBase
implements Remote
    Guidewire Software Data extraction API that uses Gosu to render the results

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String API_NAME
      static String ENTITY_ROOT_NAME

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String findEntityAndRenderWithTemplate(String entityType, String entityId, NVParam[] params, String template)
      Finds the specified entity and evaluates the given template. The entity is available as "entityRoot" in the evaluation context of the template. Also, the array of parameters is available in the context as a Map called "parameters"
      String findEntityAndRenderWithTemplateByName(String entityType, String entityPublicId, NVParam[] params, String templateName)
      Finds the specified entity and evaluates the given template, given by its name. The entity is available as "entityRoot" in the evaluation context of the template. Also, the array of parameters is available in the context as a Map called "parameters"

    • Field Detail

      • API_NAME

        String API_NAME

      • ENTITY_ROOT_NAME

        String ENTITY_ROOT_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • findEntityAndRenderWithTemplate

        String findEntityAndRenderWithTemplate(String entityType,
                                     String entityId,
                                     NVParam[] params,
                                     String template)
        Finds the specified entity and evaluates the given template. The entity is available as "entityRoot" in the evaluation context of the template. Also, the array of parameters is available in the context as a Map called "parameters"
        Parameters:
        entityType - the name of the entity type, for example User or Activity
        entityId - the public id of the entity to find
        params - parameters (name value pairs) to be inserted into the template
        template - the Gosu template, as a string
        Returns:
        the result of executing the template with the given entity and parameters

      • findEntityAndRenderWithTemplateByName

        String findEntityAndRenderWithTemplateByName(String entityType,
                                           String entityPublicId,
                                           NVParam[] params,
                                           String templateName)
        Finds the specified entity and evaluates the given template, given by its name. The entity is available as "entityRoot" in the evaluation context of the template. Also, the array of parameters is available in the context as a Map called "parameters"
        Parameters:
        entityType - the name of the entity type, for example User or Activity
        entityPublicId - the public id of the entity to find
        params - parameters (name value pairs) to be inserted into the template
        templateName - The name of the template file, which must be in config/templates/dataextraction
        Returns:
        the result of executing the template with the given entity and parameters
